THE DESIGN

Why did I bother to redesign and remake the website? Well, first of all layout and design of a product such as a website is extremenly important. Because many people including me judge a book by its cover. Letâ€™s be realistic when people see an aesthetically pleasing website, they will definitely click on it and explore around rather than just close the tab and move on.

Even though I donâ€™t take art, nor a professional designer, but I have common sense. I basically used my instinct to determine whether this page looks good or needed a few changes.

Enough talkingâ€¦Here are a few screen shots of the website.

I used neumorphic design to spice up the original mockups. I added a few shadows to the corners making the buttons look more 3D. Clean and minimal are my first priorities. This could help the users maneuver over the website smoothly, removing some friction and hopefully making the website look professional so people wonâ€™t notice a high schooler made this.
